title: My unfaithful partner
content:
Susan, 19 decided to get tested for HIV and tells what happened: I found out that my boyfriend had had sex with another girl while we were together. I had chucked him, but was left worried that I might be infected with HIV. We had been having unprotected sex. We had known each other for a long time, and we trusted each other so we hadn’t used condoms. 

That was a big mistake, I know now. I was so worried. I decided to take an HIV test. After counseling, I was called to get my results. I was sweating, and my heart was beating very first. I wanted to run out of there, but I needed to know the results. “Your result is negative. You do not have HIV, the virus that causes AIDS," the counselor told me. 

I closed my eyes and gave a prayer of thanks. I promised myself that I would not have sex again without insisting on condoms.

[Sexuality Facts][1]

[Take Action!][2]


  [1]: http://iogt.qa-hub.unicore.io/page/38cc8fc667014a05822b8935cef7c982/
